com.ikarus.solartaxi

Class Passenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.solartaxi.Passenger

  • public class Passenger
extends java.lang.Object
    Passengers wait on a planet for the taxi to take them to their target planet.
    Author:
    Nikolaus Leopold
